actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A resolution to stop the sale of three diesel-powered submarines (of the Tang Class) to Iran and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that the sale of three diesel-powered submarines (of the "Tang class") proposed by the letter from the Department of the Navy of May 15 to the Committee on Armed Services of the House of Representatives is not approved and the proposed sale shall not be carried out.

titles.title: A resolution to stop the sale of three diesel-powered submarines (of the Tang Class) to Iran and for other purposes.
